entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
